dialog.name: Valerie
dialog.text: Hey umm... can you get me to... 36 carfet please.

dialog.name: Valerie
dialog.text: Hey honey, I know that we agreed only to call each other on weekends, but I-

dialog.name: Max
dialog.text: HEY VAL! Do not apologize, I missed you so much. Sorry I havenâ€™t been able to phone as often because of work.

dialog.name: Valerie
dialog.text: Don't even worry my love, I understand. But guess what happened today!

dialog.name: Max
dialog.text: Don't tell me, is it Beth and her rumours again?

dialog.name: Valerie
dialog.text: Yup! Maybe you can convince her that she is just imagining things, like the incident with James' store!

dialog.name: Max
dialog.text: Haha I could never. At least she has moved past the her neighbors being spies.

dialog.name: Valerie
dialog.text: Seriously! Like what spies make cake?

dialog.name: Max
dialog.text: Oop, Val sorry my job is trying to reach me right now! I can call you back in a bit though?

dialog.name: Valerie
dialog.text: No worries honey! I'll be waiting here for you. I love you Maxy!
